metadata.title: CVE-2021-3508 on Ubuntu Pro FIPS 16.04 LTS (xenial) - medium
metadata.description:
A flaw was found in PDFResurrect in version 0.22b. There is an infiniteloop in get_xref_linear_skipped() in pdf.c via a crafted PDF file.

    Update Instructions:

    Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2021-3508` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
    by updating your system to the following package versions:

pdfresurrect - 0.12-6ubuntu0.2+esm1
Available with Ubuntu Pro: https://ubuntu.com/pro

criterions.comment: pdfresurrect package in xenial was vulnerable but has been fixed (note: '0.12-6ubuntu0.2+esm1').
